data.title: Unmanned Aircraft Systems (UAS)
data.text:
With the Architectural Modeling Emphasis, in addition to the UAS courses, students will take multiple modeling courses using Autodesk Revit software. Construction methods and materials and print reading courses will also be included in the program for students to have a good knowledge of construction and ability to read prints.

Type: A.A.S. degree (Unmanned Aircraft Systems degree sub-plan)

Location: Wahpeton

Cluster: Architecture and Construction

» View Program Information & Admission Requirements

The Unmanned Aircraft Systems (UAS) certificate program is designed to provide a broad understanding of the use of UAS in a commercial environment.

Type: Certificate

Locations: Wahpeton

Cluster: Architecture and Construction

Add this Certificate to an Associate’s Degree you are currently pursuing and you will be an important asset for your future employer as a Remote Pilot.

» View Program Information & Admission Requirements
